column4: hi i need help. Im trying to install Vuze 4.2 on to Intrepid Ibex
vuze is alright, but how about ktorrent?  more light waight and very nice looking if it's the KDE4 version
which it will be if on 8.10 and probably if  on 8.04  and you run  sudo apt-get install ktorrent
ok as far as I know, you sitll need java installed for vuze
maybe it's still known as Azureus in the Ubuntu repo
ok lets start with java then
you know how to install?
java ive tried i hope i did it right
yeah the sun version
can you help me install java
of course,  do you want just Java,  or  other things like  AVI suppourt  and MP3 and  Flash and so on
java for now

sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras is the easiest way to get the stuff I mentioned, but if you want just Java.   easiest way would be to go to a site  that has a java applet in Firefox such as http://www.jonstorm.com and click  on where the applet would go.  then  in  the graphical thing choose sun java
if you see the water on that site, you have  Sun java already installed, or you installed one of the other versions.  right clicking  will probably tell you
oh i have that already it works just fine in my browser and such
check that it's the sun version
ok there you go then :)
ok now for Vuze
see above
Azureues is vuze basically.  yeah  it got renamed to vuze
or get it from the vuze site
